title: The Bee's Knees
summaries: The Bee's Knees is a bow which has a 33.33*1/3 (33.33%) chance of being dropped by Queen Bee. When fired using Wooden Arrows, the bow instead emits a special Bee Arrow projectile resembling a line of bees. On impact with an enemy or solid block, the projectile will break apart, spawning 3-6 bees which home in on nearby enemies. These bees deal 33% base damage (8 base damage), can each pierce one enemy or ricochet off solid blocks once, but not both.

statistics.Tooltip: Wooden arrows turn into a column of bees
